clues.clue: The postmark on the stamp & envelope indicates it's one of these collectibles mailed on the day it was originally issued

Excursus is another term for this drift into a tangential or unrelated topic, from the Latin for "to go aside"

final_jeopardy.clue: "I had no idea of originating an American flapper... I simply took girls whom I knew very well" & "used them for my heroines"
